definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: Dunga had been in charge of his country since 2006, succeeding Carlos Alberto Parreira.
sentences.chinese: 鄧加在06年取代佩雷拉成爲國家隊主帥至今。

sentences.english: Q. In refusing to select Ronaldinho, is Dunga being wise or just stubborn?
sentences.chinese: 不帶羅納爾迪尼奧去南非，鄧加是英明呢還是頑固呢？

sentences.english: Brazil coach Dunga has declared AC Milan youngster Alexandre Pato as the 'new Ronaldo'.
sentences.chinese: 巴西主教練鄧加認爲米蘭新星帕託是“新羅納爾多”。

sentences.english: Brazil coach Denga has highlighted the Netherlands' rapid counter-attacks.
sentences.chinese: 巴西主帥鄧加特意強調了荷蘭快速反擊的打法。

sentences.english: But the Brazilian Football Federation (CBF) said that Dunga and his technical staff had been dismissed.
sentences.chinese: 巴西足協宣佈鄧加和其技術小組人員都已被解職。

sentences.english: Perhaps that is why Dunga preaches such sweat and toil.
sentences.chinese: 也許這也是鄧加大力強調血汗價值的原因。

sentences.english: The results are there to show that Dunga is on the right path.
sentences.chinese: 而結果表明鄧加正走在一條正確的路上。

sentences.english: His time has passed, Dunga said.
sentences.chinese: 但鄧加說道，他的時代已經過去了。
